mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM product WHERE categoryCode = #{categoryCode}

SELECT p.productCode, p.categoryCode, c.name, p.item, price, discount, m.nickname, THUMBNAIL FROM product p JOIN productCategory c ON p.categoryCode = c.categoryCode JOIN SELLER_BRAND s ON s.brand_code = p.brand_code JOIN MEMBER m ON m.memberIdx = s.memberIdx WHERE p.SOLDOUT = 0 AND p.categorycode = 7 ORDER BY modify DESC
